title: With Preparation (Snacks) There’s Nothing to Worry
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Hey hey, about our new practice plan….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Oh ooh! Because I always rely on Kanan-san and Dia-san for our practice plan, this time Maru thought of something! I want you two to see it zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>You’re fired up huh, Hanamaru-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Let’s see….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>This is….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ehehe, What do you think? Maru has confidence in this zura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>BUU BUU, DESU WA….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Eeh!? Why!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>What is this 「Snacks」 that is in the 「Break」 period?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ah, it means 「Snacks」 exactly as written zura! After a lot of practice you’ll become hungry, so I made sure to create a proper snack period!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I see….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>“I see” NOT, Kanan-san, Hanamaru-san, we won’t have 「Snacks」 period in our practice schedule.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Eeh~, I want to at least put 5 minutes for snacks time zura~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
